Articles.Content: Hey, I'm just wondering if the .20 part tools work for .21 stuff, or if there is a new part tools? I just reformatted pc, and have to set everything back up.

It will yes, PartTools updates on an entirely separate cycle, and in fact even PartTools .18 should work on .21

There may be a PartTools .21, PartTools .20 released a good while after KSP .20
